1: The Eternal reigns, clothed in majesty; He is dressed in power; He has surrounded Himself with strength. He has established the world, and it will never be toppled.
2: Your throne was established from the beginning of the world, O God, and You are everlasting.
3: The waters have risen, O Eternal One; the sound of pounding waves is deafening. The waters have roared with power.
4: More powerful than the thunder of mighty rivers, more powerful than the mighty waves in the ocean is the Eternal on high!
5: Your teachings are true; Your decrees sure. Sacredness adorns Your house, O Eternal One, forevermore.
